name: Two-er Defense
description:
Pesky bugs have infected the device and it's up you, the robot Narton, to defend it.  Choose two towers from four different variants to arm yourself with, and get ready to fight!  But watch out, the two towers can't cover everything at the same time, so you have to move them around the map while defending.

The game was made for United Game Jam 2020 under the theme "Two". The game fits the theme by taking the classic tower-defense genre and adding a twist where you only have two towers. This limits your arsenal and it therefor becomes a core mechanic to move the towers around while playing.

[CONTROLS]

Walk: [A] [S] [D] [W ]

Pickup, place and choose tower: [SPACE]
